meanings.definition: Failure or neglect to fulfill one's duties or obligations.
meanings.sent1: Her undutifulnesses at work led to her being reprimanded by her boss.
meanings.sent2: The undutifulnesses of the student resulted in poor grades.
meanings.sent3: The undutifulnesses of the cat towards catching mice was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His undutifulnesses towards his responsibilities were like a heavy weight on his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The undutifulnesses of the leaky faucet to stop dripping kept everyone awake at night.

meanings.definition: Lack of respect or obedience towards authority figures.
meanings.sent1: The child's undutifulnesses towards the teacher were evident in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: His undutifulnesses towards the police officer landed him in trouble.
meanings.sent3: The undutifulnesses shown towards the traffic rules by the driver were quite surprising.
meanings.sent4: Her undutifulnesses towards the judge's orders were like a slap in the face of justice.
meanings.sent5: The undutifulnesses of the wind to follow a straight path caused chaos in the park.

meanings.definition: Disobedience or defiance towards parents or superiors.
meanings.sent1: The teenager's undutifulnesses towards his parents caused tension at home.
meanings.sent2: Her undutifulnesses towards her boss resulted in her getting fired.
meanings.sent3: The undutifulnesses of the dog to obey commands made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His undutifulnesses towards his coach's instructions cost the team the game.
meanings.sent5: The undutifulnesses of the storm to follow the predicted path surprised meteorologists.
